channel.title: 3d-printing on Derek Rose: A how to guide for overthiking things.
channel.description: Recent content in 3d-printing on Derek Rose: A how to guide for overthiking things.

item.title: Just A Super [glue] Organizer
item.description: The CAddy When you do a lot of 3D printing you use a lot of super glue (AKA CyanoAcrylate, AKA “CA”).

item.title: Patio Umbrella Stand Cap
item.description: A way to keep detritus out of our outdoor umbrella stand over the weekend.

item.title: Spool Bearing Assembly
item.description: Filament Spool Bearing Assembly for a 3/4" dowel One of the issues I encountered when I decided to try to make a filament dry box out of material I had on hand was that my rod (a 19mm wooden dowel left over from Halloween) was causing too much friction.

item.title: Garage Lock Handle
item.description: Thank you for your service, vice-grips The reason I wanted to get a 3D printer was to make solutions for common problems so designing my own models was always a goal.
